content.text:
# Annandale East and Eskdale (ward)

|elects_howmany=3
|councillor1=Karen Carruthers
|party1=Scottish Conservative and Unionist Party
|councillor2=Archie Dryburgh
|party2=Scottish Labour Party
|councillor3=Denis Male
|party3=Independent (politician)
|towns=Langholm
|scot_parl=Dumfriesshire
|scot_region=South Scotland
|westminster=Dumfriesshire, Clydesdale and Tweeddale
}}
Annandale East and Eskdale is one of the thirteen wards used to elect members of the Dumfries and Galloway Council. It elects three Councillors.
